text: @RobertJenrick Rubbish, he tried to change himself from a wrongdoer into a victim in a Trump like manner. Some thought stay home was an instruction, are frightened to go out due to Covid-19 but Cummings!Even driving to Barnard Castle to test his eyes, an irresponsible fool
